post.body: Just discovered that her puppy took a dump in her daughter's shoe. It's bad that i'm laughing right?!
Wonders what Raven tastes like b/c the Titans are gonna eat them 4 lunch next wk!
Is glad the sound got fixed. Too bad the game is sucking
is wondering how long it will take CBS & WREG to figure out the sound isn't working. You can hear the music but no speaking.
Getting my HGTV fix for the day. Just waiting for some playoff football baby!
Just railed on AT&T. But I got my bill straightened out......
Watching the Price Is Right- still missing Bob
